lead_paragraph: A cousin of the late Minnesota Vikings tackle Korey Stringer was among two Connecticut players suspended indefinitely yesterday for an unspecified violation of team rules.The freshman linebacker Corey Stringer and the sophomore tailback Andre Dixon were suspended by Coach Randy Edsall. The university said there was no police involvement. Stringer is the nephew of Rutgers women’s basketball Coach C. Vivian Stringer.
